title: God's Leading Lady: Out of the Shadows and into the Light
description: Bishop T. D. Jakes, the #1 bestselling author of The Lady, Her Lover, and Her Lord and Soar! , offers women a plan for taking charge of their lives.Providing the inspiration and the tools women need to face life’s challenges, Bishop Jakes teaches women to star in the unique role God has chosen for them to play in the world. With a foundation of Christian values and faith in God’s plan, this book encourages women • Triumph in the face of adversity• Recognize the Lord’s calling• Create a godly and successful legacy—that will inspire and influence generations to come
author: T.D. Jakes
